title: BRIEF-Beko Holding says squeeze-out compensation set at EUR 5.80 per share
text:
BRIEF-Beko Holding says squeeze-out compensation set at EUR 5.80 per share 
Oct 19 Beko Holding AG : 
* Squeeze-out compensation set at 5.80 euros ($6.56) per Beko share Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: ($1 = 0.8837 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom) Trending On Reuters
